bs-privacy-module-no-function: '$1' is not a valid function name for this module
logentry-bs-privacy-request-cancel-anony: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has}} cancelled the request to anonymise {{GENDER:$2|his|her}} account
logentry-bs-privacy-request-cancel-delet: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has}} cancelled the request to delete {{GENDER:$2|his|her}} account
notification-bs-privacy-anonymization-do: Your account has been successfully anonymised. Old username: '$1'. New username: '$2'
notification-bs-privacy-deletion-failed-: We could not delete your account. Please contact wiki administrators for more information. We apologise for the inconvenience.
notification-bs-privacy-request-denied-a: User $1 denied your request to anonymise your account to username '$2'. Comment: $3
notification-bs-privacy-request-submitte: User '$1' submitted new privacy request. Module: $3. Comment: $2
